cemu-project /

      Cemu---Cemu is a Wii U emulator

rxrw /

      daily_morning---给别人家的女朋友发早安

doocs /

      leetcode---😏 LeetCode solutions in any programming language | 多种编程语言实现 LeetCode、《剑指 Offer（第 2 版）》、《程序员面试金典（第 6 版）》题解

google-research /

      multinerf---A Code Release for Mip-NeRF 360, Ref-NeRF, and RawNeRF

goatcorp /

      FFXIVQuickLauncher---Custom launcher for FFXIV

total-typescript /

      beginners-typescript---18 interactive exercises for TypeScript beginners

itorr /

      sakana---🐟「Sakana!」石蒜虚拟器

cmdr2 /

      stable-diffusion-ui---A simple way to install and use Stable Diffusion on your own computer. Provides a browser UI for generating images from text prompts and images. Just enter your text prompt, and see the generated image.

The-Run-Philosophy-Organization /

      run---润学全球官方指定GITHUB，整理润学宗旨、纲领、理论和各类润之实例；解决为什么润，润去哪里，怎么润三大问题； 并成为新中国人的核心宗教，核心信念。

limoest /

      daily_reminder---微信公众号全自动每日推送

bittentech /

      Bug-Bounty-Beginner-Roadmap---This is a resource factory for anyone looking forward to starting bug hunting and would require guidance as a beginner.

pocketbase /

      pocketbase---Open Source realtime backend in 1 file

matchy233 /

      chi-cv-template---🤩 Rip-off of skyzh's CV

runsidekick /

      sidekick---Free and open-source live application debugger. Like chrome dev tools but for your backend

snesrev /

      zelda3---

graphql /

      graphiql---GraphiQL & the GraphQL LSP Reference Ecosystem for building browser & IDE tools.

Stability-AI /

      stability-sdk---SDK for interacting with stability.ai APIs (e.g. stable diffusion inference)

fadeevab /

      design-patterns-rust---Rust examples for all 23 classic GoF design patterns, and even a little more

practical-tutorials /

      project-based-learning---Curated list of project-based tutorials

vlang /

      v---Simple, fast, safe, compiled language for developing maintainable software. Compiles itself in <1s with zero library dependencies. Supports automatic C => V translation. https://vlang.io

Akebi-Group /

      Akebi-GC---The great software for some game that exploiting anime girls (and boys).

CompVis /

      stable-diffusion---

rinongal /

      textual_inversion---

blacklanternsecurity /

      bbot---OSINT automation for hackers.

apify /

      crawlee---Crawlee—A web scraping and browser automation library for Node.js that helps you build reliable crawlers. Fast.
